en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 20% for each Enhanced Dark Orbs awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: 力の差を教えてやる
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内の闇ドロップ強化の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: 힘의 차이를 가르쳐주마
kr_skill.raw_description: 2턴 동안 팀 내의 어둠드롭 강화의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승

na_skill.name: See the difference in our strengths.
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases with the number of [Enhanced Dark Orbs] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
